name: Dziek's Christmas 2016 Snowman Experientorium
description:
Alright?

Each year I try and make a game for Christmas. This is 2016's.

It isn't finished, maybe it will be at some point. Screenshots (where ever they may live) show what could have been. At least we can dream.

However, it is (almost) Christmas, so here's what I've been working on.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - look
Right click - clump up snow, start pushing snow, stop pushing snow
Left click - this sometimes throws snowballs if you hold it for long enough

(You can play last years game here)
